Verify Password

Use the Verify Password dialog box (File | Switch User, then enter a new user name and click Yes to create a new user) to verify the password you entered when you selected to create a new user. This option is available if you can add users or if you Administrator selected the auto create users option when configuring your project database.

Field Descriptions

Password A read-only field that contains the masked password you entered on the Switch Users dialog box. The field is blank if you did not enter a password on that screen.
Verify Re-enter the password you entered on the Switch Users dialog box. Note that Version Manager passwords are case sensitive.

See Also
